1 using System;
2 using System.Collections.Generic;
3 using System.Linq;

5 using UnityEngine;

7 namespace FullInspector.Internal {
8  public class AttributePropertyEditor : IPropertyEditor, IPropertyEditorEditAPI {
13  private static Dictionary<Type, Type> _attributeEditorMappings = new Dictionary<Type, Type>();
14 
19  private static Dictionary<Type, bool> _attributeReplaceMappings = new Dictionary<Type, bool>();
20 
21  static AttributePropertyEditor() {
22  // fetch all CustomAttributePropertyEditorAttribute types
23  _attributeEditorMappings = new Dictionary<Type, Type>();
24  _attributeReplaceMappings = new Dictionary<Type, bool>();
25 
26  foreach (Type attributeHolder in
27  from assembly in AppDomain.CurrentDomain.GetAssemblies()
28  from type in assembly.GetTypes()
29 
30  where type.IsAbstract == false
31  where type.IsInterface == false
32 
33  let attribute = type.GetAttribute<CustomAttributePropertyEditorAttribute>()
34  where attribute != null
35 
36  select type) {
37 
38  if (typeof(IAttributePropertyEditor).IsAssignableFrom(attributeHolder) == false) {
39  Debug.LogWarning(string.Format("{0} has a {1} attribute but does not extend {2}",
40  attributeHolder, typeof(CustomAttributePropertyEditorAttribute).Name,
41  typeof(IAttributePropertyEditor).Name));
42  continue;
43  }
44 
45  var attribute = attributeHolder.GetAttribute<CustomAttributePropertyEditorAttribute>();
46 
47  _attributeEditorMappings[attribute.AttributeActivator] = attributeHolder;
48  _attributeReplaceMappings[attribute.AttributeActivator] = attribute.ReplaceOthers;
49  }
50  }
51

53  get;
54  set;
55  }

57  private List<IAttributePropertyEditor> _editors;
58  private bool _showPrimary;
59 
60  private AttributePropertyEditor(List<IAttributePropertyEditor> editors, bool showPrimary) {
61  _editors = editors;
62  _showPrimary = showPrimary;
63  }
64 
65  public object OnSceneGUI(object element) {
66  for (int i = 0; i < _editors.Count; ++i) {
67  element = _editors[i].OnSceneGUI(element);
68  }
69 
70  if (_showPrimary) {
71  element = NextEditor.OnSceneGUI(element);
72  }
73 
74  return element;
75  }
76 
77  private IPropertyEditor NextEditor {
78  get {
79  return EditorChain.GetNextEditor(this);
80  }
81  }
82 
83  public object Edit(Rect region, GUIContent label, object element) {
84  var heights = new List<float>(_editors.Count);
85  for (int i = 0; i < _editors.Count; ++i) {
86  heights.Add(_editors[i].GetElementHeight(label, element));
87  }
88 
89  Rect editRegion = region;
90  for (int i = 0; i < _editors.Count; ++i) {
91  editRegion.height = heights[i];
92  element = _editors[i].Edit(editRegion, label, element);
93  editRegion.y += editRegion.height;
94  }
95 
96  if (_showPrimary) {
97  editRegion.height = NextEditor.GetElementHeight(label, element);
98  element = NextEditor.Edit(editRegion, label, element);
99  }
100 
101  return element;
102  }
103 
104  public float GetElementHeight(GUIContent label, object element) {
105  float height = 0;
106 
107  for (int i = 0; i < _editors.Count; ++i) {
108  height += _editors[i].GetElementHeight(label, element);
109  }
110 
111  if (_showPrimary) {
112  height += NextEditor.GetElementHeight(label, element);
113  }
114 
115  return height;
116  }

119  return label;
120  }

122  public bool CanEdit(Type dataType) {
123  throw new NotSupportedException();
124  }
125 
126  public static IPropertyEditor TryCreate(Type editedType, ICustomAttributeProvider editedAttributes) {
127  if (editedAttributes == null) {
128  return null;
129  }
130 
131  List<IAttributePropertyEditor> editors = new List<IAttributePropertyEditor>();
132  bool replace = false;
133 
134  foreach (object attribute in
135  editedAttributes.GetCustomAttributes(/*inherit:*/ true)) {
136 
137  if (_attributeEditorMappings.ContainsKey(attribute.GetType())) {
138  Type editorType = _attributeEditorMappings[attribute.GetType()];
139  IPropertyEditor editor = PropertyEditorTools.TryCreateEditor(editedType, editorType);
140  if (editor == null) {
141  Debug.LogWarning(string.Format("Failed to create attribute property " +
142  "editor {0} for {1}", editedAttributes, editorType));
143  continue;
144  }
145 
146  IAttributePropertyEditor attributeEditor = (IAttributePropertyEditor)editor;
147  attributeEditor.Attribute = (Attribute)attribute;
148  editors.Add(attributeEditor);
149 
150  // this attribute editor replaces the other ones
151  if (_attributeReplaceMappings[attribute.GetType()]) {
152  replace = true;
153  }
154  }
155  }
156 
157  if (editors.Count == 0) {
158  return null;
159  }
160 
161  // Sort the editors by their opt-in ordering
162  editors = editors.OrderBy(editor => {
163  var attributeOrder = editor.Attribute as IInspectorAttributeOrder;
164  if (attributeOrder != null) {
165  return attributeOrder.Order;
166  }
167 
168  return double.MaxValue;
169  }).ToList();
170 
171  return new AttributePropertyEditor(editors, replace == false);
172  }
173  }
174 }
